DOC.brief_summary: This clinical trial determine safety tolerability MK0683 combination gemcitabine cisplatin and/or carboplatin .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial MK0683 Combination With FDA Approved Cancer Drugs Patients With Advanced NSCLC ( MK0683-058 )
DOC.criteria: Patient must histologicallyconfirmed metastatic locally advanced nonsmall cell lung cancer previously treat systemic chemotherapy receive nonplatinum nongemcitabine base neoadjuvant adjuvant chemotherapy last dose least 6 month prior study enrollment Patient chemotherapy , radiotherapy , biological therapy prior enter study , except adjuvant neoadjuvant chemotherapy , allow treatment tumor
DOC.keyword: Advanced Stage IIIB/IV Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
